fields_of_interest: Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
Cybersecurity Act (Regulation on ENISA, the "EU Cybersecurity Agency", and repealing Regulation (EU) 526/2013, and on Information and Communication Technology cybersecurity certification) 
 
General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: As an independent, nonprofit, global association, ISACA engages in the development, adoption and use of globally accepted, industry-leading knowledge and practices for information systems. Previously known as the Information Systems Audit and Control Association, ISACA now goes by its acronym only, to reflect the broad range of IT governance professionals it serves.
